AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: a dangerous route through South Texas where an alien died from probable heat stroke, contributed to Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez's death, guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero with inadequate supplies, traversed on foot in June and July, involves desert-like brush, temperatures reached 100-105 degrees during the journey, and poses risks due to hot summer conditions with inadequate water and food
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Journey: a hazardous path taken by aliens with inadequate supplies, resulting in hospitalizations and death due to extreme heat, misrepresented as a one-day journey, involved walking through South Texas from early morning until midnight, poses risks of injury, water-borne parasites or disease, and severe weather conditions
